properties.entry: SELECT mainMobile FROM main_customer WHERE id = #customerId# LIMIT 1

SELECT mh.assistCode AS assistCode, mp.`code` AS projectCode, mh.`name` AS houseName FROM mid_customer_house AS mch, main_customer AS mc, main_project AS mp, main_house AS mh, mid_project_house AS mph WHERE mch.customerId = mc.id AND mch.houseId = mh.id AND mph.projectId = mp.id AND mph.houseId = mh.id AND mch.relationType = 1 and IFNULL(mch.isDeleted,0)=0 AND mc.id = #customerId#
